author: glasser
msg: Fix issue #2608: Can set directory props on the root of an FSFS
Minor data loss bug.  Has been in trunk for a year (so probably
safe).  Now reported by a user
(is_this_fsfs): Remove helper function added in r21407, moved
elsewhere in a later commit, and made irrelevant by r21540.

author: glasser
msg: Make sure that file modifications during some merge tests change the
size of the file, so that it's safe to not sleep for timestamps.
modification changes size and remove the call to
Make sure that file modifications change size and remove the calls

author: glasser
msg: no-sleep-for-timestamps optimization for this test, since the
modification to mu doesn't seem to be picked up otherwise.

author: cacknin
msg: (Use copyfrom-args when creating/applying (svn)patch in a WC->WC diff
context towards file-copy (directory-copy needs some work).)
file_added and dir_added copyfrom_{path, revision} arguments.
